    • claimAttempt

      public boolean claimAttempt(Integer numberOfCardsUsed, Player player, Board gameMap, int numberOfPlayers)
      Attempts to claim the connection.
      Parameters:
      numberOfCardsUsed - the number of cards used to claim the connection
      player - the player attempting to claim the connection
      gameMap - the game map
      numberOfPlayers - the number of players in the game
      Returns:
      true if the connection is successfully claimed, false otherwise
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the number of cards used is less than 0

      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the length is invalid
